Questions
TRUE
FALSE
Selecting the decision tree split (at each node as you move down the tree) that maximizes information gain will guarantee an optimal decision tree.
Reducing the number of leaves in a decision tree will increase the Bias and decrease the Variance
Increase the number of training examples in logistic regression will eventually decrease the Bias and increase the Variance
A classifier that attains 100% accuracy on the training set and 70% accuracy on test set is better than a classifier that attains 70% accuracy on the training set and 75% accuracy on test set.
In a machine learning algorithm, if the number of parameters grow with the amount of training data, then the model is non-parametric.
RNN (Recurrent Neural Network) used for machine translation as it can be trained as a supervised learning problem.
Increasing the size of a neural network generally does not hurt an algorithm\'s performance, and it may help significantly.
Decreasing the training set size generally does not hurt an algorithm\'s performance.
A perceptron is an auto-associative neural network that contains feedback.
Neural networks mimic the way human brain works.
In a mixed-type expression involving ints and floats, Python will convert floats to ints.
None is a Python type whose value indicates that no value exists.
Dictionary values must be immutable data types.
Python determines the beginning and end of a statement based on whitespace.
A full list of Python keywords can be obtained from Python itself, using the Python keyword module.
